mapper.select: SELECT ai.album_id AS albumId, ai.album_name AS albumName, ai.album_cover AS albumCover, si.singer_name AS singerName FROM album_info ai INNER JOIN singer_info si ON ai.singer_id = si.singer_id WHERE ai.album_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND ai.delete_flag = 0 AND si.delete_flag = 0 LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT a.type_id AS typeId, t.type_name AS typeName, COUNT(s.song_id) AS count FROM album_info a LEFT JOIN song_info s ON a.album_id = s.album_id LEFT JOIN type_info t ON a.type_id = t.type_id GROUP BY a.type_id, t.type_name
